column3: Latest; Sihanoukville: According to preliminary reports
column4: a Chinese suspect allegedly stole a handbag
column5: but was arrested by the police shortly after the crime.------The incident took place at 4:10 pm March 24
column9: a 50-year-old Chinese construction worker stole the bag from a 36 year old. ------The owner was reunited with her bag
column10: containing cash and a mobile phone. The suspect is being prepared for a court appearance.
